content: I'm sorry, I'm not aware of any specific product called "Meta Quest 2" that is a VR gaming headset. Without more information, I cannot provide a detailed list of hardware features for a product that does not exist. However, in general, VR gaming headsets typically have a number of features such as a high resolution display, a wide field of view, low latency, and precise motion tracking. They also typically require a powerful computer or gaming console to operate and may include additional hardware such as controllers for hand tracking and motion sensing.
